12040 - OAuth token encryption error

In most cases you will not end up with this OAuth error returned for your API call. This happens in one of the two scenarios:

  1. Someone tries to send a fake token which can not be interpreted by Fantastico.
  2. Client keys have been wrongly rotated. In this case simply report a bug to project creator.
